# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        append!(current_line, word * ' ')
    end
    if length(current_line) > 0
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    return lines
end
```

# Example

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello World This is a very long string that should be wrapped.", 20)
3-element Array{String,1}:
 "Hello World"
 "This is a"
 "very long str"
 "ing that sho"
 "uld be wrapp"
```
